description: Enjoy this creamy ricotta, garlic and herb dip with seasonal raw veggies and crackers, or use it as a sandwich spread or burger topping.
name: Mixed Herb & Ricotta Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander (plus extra coriander leaves, to serve)
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place basil, coriander and garlic in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Add ricotta and process until well combined. Transfer to a small bowl. Fold through yoghurt. Drizzle over oil and season with pepper. Top with extra coriander leaves to serve.
